entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/plotinfo-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-test -p TAG=v2022.03.16 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=0 -p CPU_LIMIT=0 -p MEMORY_REQUEST=0 -p MEMORY_LIMIT=0 -p BASEURL=oereb-web-service.agi-oerebv2-test.svc -p TERRAVISURL=terravis-t.so.ch | oc apply -n gdi-test -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-test plotinfo-service oc rollout status -n gdi-test dc plotinfo-service
